attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
this is again ms jules belton - head teacher at st matthias c of england primary school in hackeny.

we the parents want discipline in our school, we are in the Hackney (black community) we will not have you turning our children against us, our children's school has been turned into police station, where police and parents fight in front of our kids, you joined the school in September and u have destroyed many homes, u are wasting tax payer money.  you must leave!

rejection.details: You cannot submit a petition which references a specific individual. This is potentially libellous. If you have an issue with this particular Head Teacher, I suggest you take it up with your local authority, or with the school board.
reasons: The names of individual officials of public bodies, unless they are part of the senior management of those organisations
